name: Piggy Princess
description: Help Piggy Princess escape from prison! Use physics, water and objects to solve puzzles. Launch Piggy Princess like in Angry Birds games.+ 50 amazing levels. Beautiful graphics.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP Processor: Pentium IV Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card with 1 GB memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 450 MB available space Sound Card: 16 bits

reviews.review_text: 4.6/10 - More Accurately Named 'Farty Pig' the App.  This is another Angry Birds knock-off, with some elements that do make this game somewhat enjoyable. I just can't rate this positive when your character the piggy achieves flight by eating beans and farting. This has free Android app written all over it! The price isn't bad all things considered but there are better ways to spend $3.  This game does offer some cool building elements, you have to use additional items in order to clear a path for your farty pig to fly! I enjoyed this aspect of the game the most for sure! Overall, this game isn't terrible but not creative enough in all areas to get me excited enough to vote positive.   Worth $0-2.99 based on how low your expectations are. There are 50  amazing  levels.     Accidently Reviewed

Even with the cheap price, I can't recommend this game. It plays poorly, moving around is slow and there just isn't much fun here. You're better off playing Angry Birds instead, and it'll save you some money.
